parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The wheel alignment/tracking issue can cause the motorcycle to pull to the right, leading to rider fatigue, loss of control, and increased risk of accidents. It can also result in premature and uneven tire wear.
symptoms: The motorcycle pulls to the right
requires constant steering pressure to maintain direction

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, or leave the rider stranded, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: oil drops or stains on the rear wheel or tire
radial stripes on the rear tire
oil leaking from the final drive

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Pull to the Right (PTTR) Issue in BMW Cruiser Motorcycles
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The PTTR issue can cause loss of control, accidents, and injuries, especially on a two-wheeled vehicle. It can also lead to premature tire wear and rider fatigue.
symptoms: The motorcycle pulls to the right
